text: @JoeBiden I suppose you are blaming @realDonaldTrump for the 50k annual deaths resulting from the Flu also? How stupid do you think Americans can be to blame the president for COVID-19 - he shut down travel from China and you called him racist. YOU would have kept it open spanky. https://t.co/2edCRYJ79d
